about_the_game: WEIL is an interactive audiovisual experience which seeks to tell a story based on real events about a boy who suffers from depression, verbal and psychological harassment, with this we want to show our players what a person can experience in this type of situations and how this can affect him throughout his life, until he attempts suicide.

content_descriptors.notes: WEIL addresses psychological issues such as depression, verbal abuse and suicide.

detailed_description: WEIL is an interactive audiovisual experience which seeks to tell a story based on real events about a boy who suffers from depression, verbal and psychological harassment, with this we want to show our players what a person can experience in this type of situations and how this can affect him throughout his life, until he attempts suicide.
name: WEIL

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ (2 * 2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 5570 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: WEIL is an interactive audiovisual experience that tells the story of a boy who suffers from depression, verbal, and psychological harassment. Through this, we aim to show players the impact these experiences can have on a person’s life, leading to suicidal thoughts.
